name: Battlezone (Recreation)
description:
Battlezone 1980 was developed and published by Atari Inc.

A first-year project for graduating the second block of my study at Breda University of Applied Sciences.

Introduction:

Battlezone is a first-person shooter tank combat. The player is in control of a tank that is being assaulted by other tanks and missiles. They may use a tiny radar scanner to find nearby foes in the desolate environment.

For the project:

I had 7 weeks to recreate the game with several enemies added to it. Two of the weeks were spent researching the game and 5 weeks learning how to recreate the different mechanics in Unreal Engine 5.0.
